document_data.name: Yarjack Blamreld
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|101|11}}{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|137-138|15}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Yarjack Blamreld''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He flung loose hairs from his beard when deep in thought. He felt he was getting in on years.
document_data.Description: His beard was scraggly, and he had a bulbous nose.
document_data.Abilities: Presumably, he had abilities to divine something about dead bodies.
document_data.Relationships: He was known by name to [[Glathra Barcantle]].
document_data.History:
In the wake of the violence that erupted during the [[Council of the Dragon]], Glathra Barcantle wanted to make sure [[Lareikaun]] and Yarjack Blamreld checked the bodies of the lords that died during the attempt on King [[Foril Obarskyr I]]'s life.

He was later commanding the [[War Wizard]]s who sought to capture [[Marlin Stoneserpent]], whose mission swiftly turned to rescuing the people at [[Stormserpent Towers]]. Through the aftermath, he took note of the character of a freshly recruited War Wizard, [[Caldor Raventree]], who reported to him, and coordinated with a number of priests and [[Purple Dragon]] troops.
